content.text: 22 A man riding a horse looks at the stars. In his hand is KRISHNA’s box.
Oka adbutam jarigey gadiyelo koni jeevithaalu aa kroddhipaati samayamlo taarumaarai, aa adhbuthaaniki margamu chuuputaaru CUT TO:
33 A man is grinning. He grabs onto a box next to him. The idol is behind him. A kid comes in and steals it. CUT TO:

44 A group of men rise from the water. In the middle a female priest holds the idol up high. When she does this, she gets shot by an arrow. The box falls into the water and reaches the bottom of the sea. CUT TO:
55 A religious man picks up the box from the desert sand and shows it to the man standing next to him. He hands it to CUT TO:
77 A traditional dancer dances and worships the idol. CUT TO:

88 Two monks are meditating - an older monk and a very young child. Three people are fighting in front of them, trying to kill each other. One of them dies and falls at the monk’s feet. His sword goes through the older monk, killing him. The child opens his eyes and runs to where the box is. He picks it up and runs away. CUT TO:
99 The Dalai Lama hands the box to a CIA agent. CUT TO:
1010 A folder is slammed on a desk. On the folder is written “Kalpa Vigraha” and scribbled next to it is “27000 years old” CUT TO:
1111 The box is put inside a chest and is pushed into a shelf. A giant bar shuts the door close. CUT TO:
1212 The chest is open. There is nothing inside it. Alarms go off, red lights everywhere buzzing. CREDITS END. 1313 FADE OUT.

1414 SUPERIMPOSE: 2009. On the edge of a platform in tattered, dishevelled rags, two bums, SURESH and a mute BUM, are smoking up using chillams and listening to the Gita on the radio. The mute BUM is slow-dancing against a female mannequin torso stuck in the middle of a tree. RADIO (V.O.) Jaatasya hi dhruvo martyurdhruvaam janma martasya cha tasmaadaparihaaryerthe na tvam sochitumarhasi. Puttina vaaniki maranamu tappadhu. Maraninchina vaaniki janmamu tappadhu. Anivaaryamagu ee vishayamunu goorchi Sokimpa tagadhu. SURESH takes the radio and opens a compartment in the back. He takes out some weed from it, puts it in his chillam, and continues smoking up. CUT TO:

1515 A fast moving ambassador car on the Hyderabad-Chennai National Highway is blaring out the song "Gudi yenekka naa swamy gurram ekkutunte". The three men in the car are drinking. A green briefcase is beside SURI, a tough looking goon, who sits in the back. The car goes faster, the music gets louder, drinks go down, all of which is interrupted by a heavy thud - the car hits a divider and flies through the air. CUT TO:
1616 The mute BUM sees the accident and gestures wildly to SURESH. He turns off the radio and continues gesturing, when SURESH hits him on the head in an attempt to calm him. CUT TO:

1717 SURESH and the mute BUM are surveying the accident spot - the two men from the front of the car are dead. The car's blinking sidelight lights up SURI's bleeding face, who lay on the road almost dead. SURI barely musters the strength to ask them for help. The mute BUM wants to, but SURESH stops him, and points at SURI...or rather his gold ring. CUT TO:

1818 The bums are rummaging through their loot - jewelry, money, cell phones, and the green briefcase. SURESH opens the briefcase and finds a curious-looking antique idol. He thinks it is worthless, and gives it to the mute BUM, grabbing the rest. The BUM gratefully accepts it, immediately playing with it like a toy. Police sirens can be heard from the highway. SURESH is perturbed. He pockets as much loot as possible and scrambles. The BUM has the idol and the green briefcase with him. CUT TO:

1919 A goon runs past the opulent gates, stairs, hallway and enters a vast room which has the FOREST MINISTER, a man in his 60s, with imposing presence and stature, lays his feet on SURESH. They are surrounded by the minister's goons, a woman sitting on a chair and watching TV, with the minister's LEAD GOON standing close to the FOREST MINISTER.
Saar... nenu nijam cheptunaanu, paniki raadhani aa moogodiki ichesaanu saar... naa daggara ivvi tappinchi inkem leevu
Ekkada dorkatledu... The FOREST MINISTER keeps thinking. The TV in the background continues to show a program on a demigod/Baba type personality.
Aa sound tagginchu! Mimalni kaadhu, aa bhakti channel petkunna aa donga baabani okati kottaali The TV's volume goes down
Veedeni em cheddham? Champeyanaa? The FOREST MINISTER pauses. He glances at both the TV and SURESH.

Karchu janaalu chuskuntaaru, manaku kaavalsindhi moogodu. Vaadu ela untaado manaki telidhu...Vaadu bayataki raavalante veedu velugolooki raavali...mana nalladanaanni telupu ki marchadaaniki yantram kaavaali... CUT TO:

2020 SUPERIMPOSE: 2016 The FOREST MINISTER is watching TV, which is playing a commercial of CHINTHAN BABA's Cola-flavored Goumuutram. He is flanked by VASU, who seems like he is waiting on the FOREST MINISTER, but can't do anything about it.
Edi popularity roju roju ki ee pichi janallo perigipotundi kani aa pichodu maatram dorakatledhu.
Popularity peregadam to vaadilo nijamgaane daivuni punindhi anukuntunnaadu saar
Sarele vigraham dorikina taravaatha vaadini sajeeva samaadhiloki pampudhaam. Dabbu flow aagadu. The FOREST MINISTER pulls out a his wallet and hands a purple parchment - a brand new 2,000 rupee note.
Deeni valla mana jeevitaalu maarutaayi...pub ki velli ivvu...appude manaki kavaalsindhi dorukuddhi...pani jagratta. VASU is smiling and staring at the note.
Nuvvu marchipo anna, nenu chusukunta CUT TO:

2121 ANJI, a frail man in his late 30s, sits opposite the kitchen on the bathroom floor, as he shampoos a cocunut. He wears a DIY utility belt - holstered with a small broom, a spray gun, hand sanitizer, a wet wipe, a set of disposable gloves, and a rag. ANJI (V.O) Nuvvu asalu manishivena...sorry, dhevudivi kadaa...aina parledhu...ilaanti manishi dhaggara nannu panilo pettadaaniki neeku manavatvam unda...adey deivatvam...veedu clean and green ani champestunaadu...naalo calorielu anni karchestunnaadu... GOVARDHAN is a man wearing an old black, round-frame spectacles, clad in a dhoti, forehead smeared with vibhudhi and kumkum, holding camphor and a pooja bell in surgical glove-clad hands. He is praying to photo frames of different sizes and shapes with Lord Anjaneya, the bachelor god, in different positions, and chanting the sthothram of Anjaneya.
Manojavam maruthulya vegam jithendriyam..Jithendhrayam..budhi. .budhi. He sees his watch

Anjaneya..repu continue chestha swami, meeku echinaa time aipoindhi emi anukokandi. ANJI! ANJI (V.O.) Chusaava ela arustunnaado...aaro nela porapaatuna puttesina ambothulaaga...kudurite naaku vere pani chudu...leda vaadini aedo case lo book chesi Bihar jailu ki pampichu...
Orei ANJI gaa...entha sepu raa...tiffin ready cheyyi ANJI stands right behind him. As soon as GOVARDHAN turns around, ANJI hands him a glass of milk.
Oorkondi sir, podhunna ae pagalgaadaina salla thaguthada..? ingo paalu. Thaagu.
Oddu ra..neeluni kadigi teesukuni raa taguthaanu CUT TO:

2222 GOVARDHAN walks into the kitchen. Neatly and slowly, he places a tray on the dining table, cuts off the edges of the banana, peels it, eats it with a fork and a knife, drinks the buttermilk, wearing white surgical gloves the entire time. CUT TO:
2323 GOVARDHAN walks into the hall, where the TV is playing a song with Nayanthara.
Orei!ANJI! Nenu chachipothanu ra ANJI walks in
Nayanthara saar, vachina kottalo boddhuga muddhuga vundedhi...ippudu slim gaa sukumaaram gaa undhi...time dorrakka concentrate cheyadam ledhu kaani...oka saari meeru vadilithe...
Nenu adugutundhi Nayanthara gurinchi kaadu, TV meedha aemundi ani A cockroach slowly moves across the TV's face

Ippudu champadam kaadhu, intlo unna vastuuvulanni bayata pettu...mottham illanta vethuku inka enni vunnaayi...enni rakaala janthuvulu unnaayi... vaatini pattuko...illu kadugu...nenu vache varaku kadugutu ne undu..nenu vachaaka vaatini pudchi samaadhi chesi appudu lopalaaki veldam... ANJI (V.O.) Dhaani badlu oka saari nannu champi samaadhi cheyyi raa...neeku nenu chesthunna seva inkevarikaina chesthe ippaatiki Nobel Prize iche vaaru
Boddhinka pattukunaaka routine follow avvu - kitchen vaipu raaku, padhahaaru saarlu dettol aesi aa cheyyi kadugu. CUT TO:

2424 GOVARDHAN is getting dressed in his bedroom. His wardrobe is filled with countless shirt and trousers, the exact same color. Nothing else. He struggles to pick a dress. He finally gets dressed - a tight trouser, an over-sized shirt, wearing an old-fashioned tie. CUT TO:

2525 GOVARDHAN leaves, carrying an old, brass lunch box in one hand, and an old-school Milton water flask strapped to his shoulder. He locks the door with a weird, wieldy lock. He walks past his "jagratta" doormat. Inside, ANJI, his manservant, locked in at the window, is visibly praying.

NARRATOR (V.O.) Ithani peru Govardhan Anandam Sharma. Perulo unna aanandam moham meedha epudu undadhu. Prapachamlo gaali peelche ae jivini nammadu. Eeyana prakaram lokamlo andharu eyanani mosam cheyadaniki puttina vallu, ledhante already mosam chesina vallu. Obsessive compulsive disorder ani chesina pani malli malli athiga chesthuntaadu, subratha athi subrathani minchipoyina athi Govardhan. Athi jagratha anduke job kuda bank lo security program ki head CUT TO:

2626 A Toyota Fortuner, with the single digit number 9 on its plate, stops at the building’s gate. Four well built men rush in and enter past the gate, and almost immediately rush out with a POMERANIAN spitz. They enter the Toyota Fortuner and drive away. POM OWNER (O.S.) Mahalakshmi! Mahalakshmi! Mahalakshmi ni kidnap chesaaru! Hearing this inside the security cabin near the gate wakes an asleep INUMAYYA. INUMAYYA is a filthy little man with a shaggy beard and shabby clothes. He wears a dark blue uniform and a blue cap common among the security guards, only a small metal alcohol flask around his neck to go with it. INUMAYYA has a drink from the flask before going back to sleep. CUT TO:
2727 INUMAYYA sits on the stairs trying to convince the OLD MAN, in his early fifties, is crying sitting on the stairs.
Ila jarigindhenti raa..dhevuda adhe ee vayasulu ontari vaadini aipoyaanu...
Okondi..sir! GOVARDHAN is walking towards them from behind, visibly irritated by the loud crying.
Excuse me, konchem chinnaga edavandi, ledhante mee intlo kurchoni edavandi. Manners ledha edho kompalu munigipoyinatlu INUMAYYA gets up and goes towards GOVARDHAN.

Sir..papam! Aunty lechipoindhi In the meanwhile, the LADY from the flat walks in coolly with the granddaughter and her friend, unloading luggage. They seem to have come from the airport. Everyone is shocked. The OLD MAN cries tears of joy and runs towards his wife. INUMAYYA stares at them.
Raatri kidnap ani arichaadu manners lekunda The POM OWNER now walks in, with his POMERANIAN in his hands
Arichindhi aayina kaadhu nenu...dongasachinodlu Mahalakshmi ni kidnap cheyadaaniki try chesaaru

Manchi pani chesindru...Idi naa notlo voritiki velindhi..Che Che Tee Vee lo chusaa GOVARDHAN shakes his head and walks away. NARRATOR (V.O.) Peru INUMAYYA. Peruki building watchman. Suddha thaagubothu. Building lo em jarigina chusthaadu, kani entha chusthadaanadhi maatram theleedhu. Vaadi maikam vaani entha chudanisthe antha! CUT TO:
EXT. A BUSY TRAFFIC SIGNAL - DAY
2828 An old beetle ragtop stands still at a busy traffic signal. SULOCHANA, a young hipster looking woman, is driving the car. Her cell phone rings.
Hello MARKETEER (O.S.) Hello Madam! Neenu BDBI bank ninchi call chesthunnaanu madam. Meeru maa privileged customer avaddam valla low interest rate loans ki meeru eligible madam.
Loan aa... MARKETEER (O.S.) Avunu madam home loan, vehicle loan, education loan, EMI... The signal turns green, but SULOCHANA is still on the phone, not driving.
Naaku meeru chepinavi anni unnaayi kaani shopping ke dabbulu levu... oka naalugu lakshalu shopping loan isthaara? The line goes dead.
Hello...hello She dials the number back. The screen splits into two - showing the marketeer on one side of the screen and SULOCHANA on the other.
Hello! Naa peru SULOCHANA. Nenu TV99 lo journalist ni. Naaku loan kavali... Another executive points at the marketeer’s screen - "don’t answer!"
Wrong number. The MARKETEER hangs up. The traffic around SULOCHANA cuss her out; all of it has come to a standstill because of her. CUT TO:
2929 SULOCHANA walks home after parking her car. A PUG, leashed to a chain behind a small gate, is barking at her.
Whiskey Whiskey emitamma arusthunaaavu .. aakalesthundaa... The PUG Barks

neeku teeskellannaa sussu ki? She opens the gate, but before she could grasp a hold of the leash, the PUG runs. GANAPATHI, a balding middle-aged bespectacled man, is SULOCHANA’s boss, the editor of the TV channel she works for, and also her neighbor. GANAPATHI chases after the dog.
Adi kaadu sir, Whiskey arusthunte sussu ki emo sahayam chedhaamani gate theesaanu, vachesthundi kangarupadakandi

Enti amma kangaru padedidi! Last time kuda ila ne gate theesavu, thanaki vethiki thechukovadaaniki vaaram patthindi, nuvvu chese sahaayam valla nashtam tappa laabam ledu. Ee roje illu kaali chesesthaanu! Naa valla kaadu!
Urkondi sir meeru marini, randi car ekkandi, velli vethukudham. GANAPATHI is infuriated... he goes to the car and starts kicking the rear bumper

Akkada kaadu sir car driver side door ni tannandi...oka naalugu rojulu ninchi stuck ayindhi. GANAPATHI, confounded, continues kicking the rear bumper, when the car's music system starts playing a song.

Sir serigga thannandi, indaaka koncham aina vacheydhi...ippudu adhi kuda raavatledhu... GANAPATHI feels helpless, seeing as to how his aggression doesn't seem to have much of an effect on SULOCHANA. He leaves, screaming out loud. CUT TO:
3030 SULOCHANA is leaving her house, when she finds her old GRANDMOTHER on the treadmill.
Aa uriki tinni kurchovadam enduku ani idogo ee pani chestunna...tinnadi aragaali gaa
Appudu ila kaadu cheyalsindhi She turns up the speed on the treadmill and leaves. The GRANDMOTHER can't keep up with the machine and collapses.

NARRATOR (V.O.) Sulochana kashtaalu vethukkuni mari thechukune rakam. NARRATOR (V.O.) Evariko manchi cheeddhaam ani poyi thanu thittulu thine rakam..venakata ki peddhalu oka maata cheppevaaru..ee prapancham lo manchi cheddhaam ani chedu chesinavaare ekkuva ani. Aa kovaku chindindhe ee pilla. CUT TO:

3131 We hear someone's steady breath in the dark, the jingle of keys and some barely audible whispers. Someone opens the door stealthily; three men tip-toe in. They go to the bedside. One of them switches off the fan, another pulls out a knife and a lighter. We hear slurping and licking noises. VEDA, in his 20s, wakes up. The lights are turned on, three people scream “Happy Birthday raa Mama”. VEDA stares at them for five whole seconds, blinking, trying to make sense of the situation. One of the three is BHANU, his roommate, wearing torn clothes, with an empty bottle of whiskey in his hand.
Naa birthday aypoyi six months ayyindhi
Nee chetha cake cut cheyisthe maa celebrations aipoyinatte. VISHAL, also in his 20s, is wearing a baby sling (without a baby) across his chest.
Mamma idhigo chaaku, adhigo cake-u cut chey. VEDA looks at VISHAL and asks
Paerenti? BHANU calmly turns to VISHAL and asks

Aha, VISHAL gadu. Nuvvu koye. BHANU looks at VEDA blankly, not realizing the farcical nature of the situation. VEDA rolls his eyes and looks at HARSHA, who is asleep on VEDA's floor, half sitting, half resting against the wall. BHANU pulls out a pastry with a candle on it and looks at VEDA.

Abba cake koye. BHANU blows the candle and holds VEDA's hand and makes him cut the pastry. The rest of them sing the birthday song. half- broken, half-slurring. Suddenly, VEDA lifts his leg from the floor, seeing a PUG trying to lick his foot. BHANU looks down at the PUG, picks it up and shoves it onto VEDA's hands.
Aa macha! Marchipoya idhigo ne birthday gift.
Kukkara, bochhu leni hutch kukka. Neeke.
Aedho thayda koduthundhi BHANU straps out the baby sling from VISHAL's chest and gives it to VEDA
Get out rascals. Pani paata ledhu. Rathirlu janaalni disturb cheyadaaniki baildherutharu oorimeeda ki.
Antavu ra antavu..friends ani kuda chudakundaa..potham ra potham..randra... BHANU pacifies the crying VISHAL, and throws a credit card at VEDA.
Thesko..malli prodhunavaraku room ki osthey adugu VEDA looks at the clock, which shows 5:00 a.m.
Rey idhi..idhi..naa card raa...nee dhaggarikela vachindhi?
Adigi theskunte borrow raa..adakkunda thiskunte dhobbeyadam antaruu
Edichav..bodi card. Okka party ke limit challe.
NARRATOR (V.O.) Ithanu oo pedda software engineer...

(sarcastically) okappudu. Ippudu paedha software engineer. Yeppatiki bench meeda vundalanukunnaadu.. Kaani company benche laagesindi..anthey. Aa bhadhalonchi therukune lopu kudhirina pelli cancel ayyindhi. NARRATOR (V.O.) Pelli kudhirindhanna santhosham lo partylu, shoppinglu antu cardulu viparithanga geekadu..appula baadha, recovery agents gola perigipoyindhi, dhaaniki thodu thagubothu roommate dorikina dabbulu dorikinattu ethukelthaadu..ippudu karchulaki dabbulu levu, gikadaaniki cardulu levu, by the way..peru Veda Shankar. CUT TO:

3232 CHINTHAN BABA sits cross legged on a raised platform in the middle of an exorbitant pool. His devotees greet him with warm applause. A mic is passed around in the audience to a middle aged man. Before the man can say anything, CHINTHAN BABA nonchalantly interrupts him
Avunu andi..oka question adagaali The MAN is about to say something when CHINTHAN BABA interrupts again
Lighter kanapaduthundhi...cigarette veliginche lighter... The MAN is perplexed

Ee Nikrushtamaina ee parikramam ippude maaneyaali...oka pancheyyi...ashram store ke velli nalabai “dhumapaanam arikatte pattilu“ konukko..leda yenabai teesukunte 20% discount... The devotees start cheering and chanting his name. Meanwhile, the FOREST MINISTER arrives. People start saluting him, as he heads right to CHINTHAN BABA. Over the pool, he greets him, bends over and touches CHINTHAN BABA’s feet.
Lopalaki raa maataddaali The two of them walk along the platform connecting the pool to dry land. CHINTHAN BABA spots SULOCHANA in the crowd.
Nee kavalsina valla ki tvaralo problem vosthundi...vachinappudu naa daggariki raa

Prati manishiki problem raavatam sahajame...ippudu kerchief veysedam valla ae problem vachina naa daggariki vastundi He looks at his disciples. The masses are frenzied again. CHINTHAN BABA leaves to a rockstar exit. CUT TO:

3333 CHINTHAN BABA is surrounded by his men. The FOREST MINISTER walks up to him and slaps him. CHINTHAN BABA and his men don’t say a word. The FOREST MINISTER then calmly washes his hands with dettol. The FOREST MINISTER walks back to CHINTHAN BABA.
enni saarlu cheppaanu raa....kaalla meeda pade lopullo lepamani
Minister anakaa vaardhanaalu baba anakaa aashirwaadalu ivaakunda ela untaaru raa.

Ade, ishtam lekapote shake hand ivvali, leda foreigners la peck ivvaali anthe kaani kodtaara? ilaage kottaarante indaake ichina ashirvaadamu cut, neeku dorakaalsina vigraham fatt correct cheppinchaanu ante neeku padavi kuda aamfattu.
Nee bonda lee kaani, naa vigraham sangethenti
Sangatemundhi, naa daggara inka raaledu..aina oorilo dabbulu paadeste enno puraaturaalla vigrahaalu konukkovachu kadaa
Anni vigrahaalu to aayushu peragadu kadaa...
Oh ee vishayam eppudo cheppalsindhi. Manadagara oka nitya Yaavana cream undi. Nuvvu kaabatti 20% discount lo ista. Roju rasukunte musali vaadilaa kanapadavu
Asalu em anukuntunnaavu raa nee gurinchi...ninnu baba ni chesindhi nenu. Malli nee maayalu naa meedhiki prayogistunnaava?
Ade kaadu ee nitya yavana cream nijamgaane baaga panichestundi nenu kudaa vaaduta

Nooru mooyi vedavaa. Naaku kaavalsindi "Kalpa Aayushmaan Vigraham" Daanini neetilo vesthe, vigraham karigipoyi neeti ki shakti ni istundi. Aa neelani thaagithe thombai samvatsaraalodikaina inko yaabai samvatsaraalu ayushu perugutundi
Sare, neeku aa vigraham iste nee dabbanta naade naa
Ninnu pudcheyana CHINTHAN BABA stays quite for a beat

Nenu cheppedidhi jaagrattagaa vinu...repu India lo oka adbutham jaragabothundhi...mana daggara unna black money anthaa container ki ekkinchu...naa manushulu iddaru vasthaaru, vaalaki aa container handover cheyyi...ardhamainda...
Inta clear ga cheppaaru, ardham kaakunda untundaa...Kaani aa adbuthame artham kaaledu
Neeku ardam avalsina avasaram ledu... CUT TO:
3434 A TV set is airing Modi's inaugural demonetization speech. Two men, VASU and RAJU, are sitting at a table with bundles of brand new currency, sorting through them.
Anna entha sepudininchi print chesina container fill avadhu enti anna...Musalodu bodi Adavi Saka Mantri ayithe ne intha undhi, mari migitha vaallu deggara entha untundho
Idi chillara raa...aina idi mana musalodidhi okkadidhe kaadu, deentlo naluguru aiduguriki vaata vundhi...aeenaki padi retlu vunnolu kuda vuntaaru...vallu ee paatiki maarchesi vuntaaru...
Orey VASU evaru, enti anni adakku raa...daaniki samaadaanam ledu, vunna bayatiki raadu...ikkada mana batukulanni percentage la meeda nadustunaayi adi iste aedaina jarigipotundi
Ivi print cheyadaanike aedusthunnaaa RAJU’s phone buzzes.
Anna chepanna FOREST MINISTER (O.S.) Rey, repu jagrattha. Dock 45 lo aa note isthey container handover chestaaru
Sare anna FOREST MINISTER (O.S.) Akkada taagakandi...thaeda jaruguthe thoollu thesi pathestha..
Sare anna FOREST MINISTER (O.S.) Poina saari aa SURI, NARASIMHA ila ne cheppaaru...chattanakodukulu vigraham pogettaaru
Abba, nuvvu marchipo anna The phone call ends
Fast gaa kaanivvu raa, load cheyyi
Denni yevadu aapaledu raa... CUT TO:

3535 GOVARDHAN walks into the bank, to see his desk occupied by a MARILYN, a sharply dressed Caucasian woman, tall, early 30s. Seeing her occupying his desk, GOVARDHAN looses his shit. He creates a big ruckus over it. The bank’s MANAGER, also a woman, exits her cabin and walks up to them.
GOVARDHAN garu oka sari na cabin ki vosthaara?
Nenu raanu The MANAGER stares him down, like talking to a child.
3636 Inside her cabin, GOVARDHAN sits across MARILYN and the MANAGER.
GOVARDHAN garu eema MARILYN. Mana ATMs ne re-calibrate cheyadaaniki vacharu
Hello MARILYN rapidly turns her face away after the pleasantries. GOVARDHAN doesn't bother.
Aavida ikkada unde varuku mee desk aeme ki isthunaam. Meeru kaaliga unna aa pakka cabin ki maarandi.
Adi idi kaadu. Tanu reserve bank nundi vachhina officer, tanu rendu rojulu ikkade untaaru. Ee rendu rojulu neeku vere place arrange chesaanu. So please.
Kudharadhu adhi naa chair, nenu akkade kurchovaali...

dhaanike inko chair ivvu. Entha maniddaram ee bank lo okesaari join ayi nuvvu mundhu manager ayite matram naa chair lo inkollani kurchobedataava? The MANAGER feels helpless, seemingly arguing with him for no reason
Sare naa chair lo kurcho... nene prakkana kurchoni santhakaalu pettukunta GOVARDHAN immediately gets up from his chair, almost insulted.

Chi chi ee chair nairutilo undi. Deentlo kurchunte aa daridrapu manager post... nenu vaasthu antha chusukoni eshanyaaniki turpuku madhyalo suryakiranaalu padelaaga vesukunnaanu...naa chair maatrame naakkavaali...
Meeku mee kurchi kavali.. anthe ga..? entha quick ga ee roju finish avutundo, anthe quick ga aame pani avtundi. anthe tondarga mee chair meeku dorkutundi. GOVARDHAN stares. CUT TO:
3737 GOVARDHAN is seen ushering out the customers from the bank.

vellu tondarga. Asalu mee evarki telida bank 2:30 varake open chesi untundi ani. hello, Sir.. andarini mutukovadam appandi, nannu mutukunte mariyada ga undadu. Eyy security, intha sepu enti ra? Evaraina vellanu ante, shoot chesi padei. Yedi yemaina aa blood matram na meeda padakudadu. The now irritated MANAGER yells.
Meeku social skills asala lekunda pothunaayi. Eemani ee roju sayantram city chupinchandi. Mimmalni adagatledhu chepthunnaanu. CUT TO:

3838 GANAPATHI is watching different news broadcasts on a set of monitors. They all play the same story - that two terrorists have been caught by the police the day before. SULOCHANA walks up next to him, seeming confident.
Enti Sir, full khushi lo unattunnaaru, report adiripoinattundi, TRP oo range lo unnattundi
Ninna enta mandi terrorists dorikaaru SULOCHANA
Mari mugguru ani report enduku ichaavu?

Unnaaru, parigetthi parigetthi aavesapadutunnaaru..em kaavalo cheppu... KENNEL OWNER (O.S.) Em ledu, ee roju aa kukka ni mating ki teesko vastaanu ani 1,500 teeskunnaaru. Eppudu vastaarani adagadaaniki phone chesaanu VEDA hears this and snatches the phone back.
Sir, ippudu chaala kashtam aina paristhithi lo unnaam...taravaata phone chesta
Asalu siggu anedidhi ledha? Entha dabbu lekapothe illa kukka sperm ni ammi bathukedaamani decide ayyavaa...
Bha ippudu adha important...manamu ippudu Usain Bolt laaga paragettaledante mundunna aadu dorakaka venekunna veellaki dorikipotaam. The chase continues till the goons stops.
Ne abba, paina chudu The camera tilts up to show police station sign
Police aa anna, vallu police station ki elte lock aipotaaru
Sare, em jaruguddo chuddam CUT TO:

9797 The station is empty, except for a few women to whom SUBBA RAJU is showing off his acting skills, a constable and VEERAYYA. ANTHONY rushes in, soon followed by VEDA, GOVARDHAN and SULOCHANA. SUBBA RAJU walks over to them.
Veelle saar podduna iddarini kaalchi champindhi The three are shocked.
Sir abaddam Sir!!... Atlantidhi em jaragaledu sir... Sir nenu software engineer sir... Poddunundi mammalni evaro irikisthunnaru sir.
Ledu saar.. Aa iddarini champindi veelle saar. Nannu champali ani follow chesthunaru saar SUBBA RAJU looks at the three intently.
Noru moosthaara iddaru! Rei ee muggurni cell lo padenyandi ra...
I am a journalist, nannu chaala light gaa teeskuntunnaaru meeru
Mee channel vaalle nee gurinchi TV lo aesaaru
Maakem theleedu sir... idantha pedda kutra!!! Nijanga sir... nenu software employee sir....
Thelusu ra nuvvu software engineer vi, neeku aa ammayiki pelli kudiridhi,udhyogam udhindhi, pelli agipoyindhi...inka emanna cheppamantaava? GOVARDHAN feels cheated after learning this.

Nannu evvaru leni khali cell lo pettandi. SUBBA RAJU does not pay attention to them and walks away with ANTHONY. The three are taken to a cell which has two more inmates - one of whom is the BUM. SULOCHANA is looking around very uncomfortably, and gets behind VEDA to feel a little secure. GOVARDHAN is pissed at being thrown into a cell with so many people. He stands near the bars. VEDA takes SULOCHANA, and the two dejectedly sit in a corner looking at GOVARDHAN, staring at them. The fifth man in the other corner of the cell eyes SULOCHANA - this pisses her off.
Ammayillani pettalsina cells vere untaayi gaa... I am a journalist... naaku rules telusu
Idi chinna station. Inko cell khaaliga ledhu. Kaasepu aagithe aadavaalla station ki maarusthaaru.
Adi clean ga untada? VEERAYYA looks at him, confused.
Nenevarina... nenu repu court lo saakshyam cheppedaanni... champindhi meere ani, nannu kidnap chesaarani...
Chusaava? Ammayilni nammoddante vinaledu... nethi noru kottukunna!!
Bha! Meeru meeru kottukusaavandi... nannu laagaddhu madhyaloki.
Ye!.. Nee tho maatlaadatam naaku cheap kaanappudu, naa tho kotlaadatam etla avuthadi.
(pointing his finger at her as a warning) Idigo!..
Yelu irichestha malli ala chupichaavante naaku.
Aa nuvvu iricheyi, appudu gaani nee meeda attempted murder case pettakapothe chuudu...
Aghorichinatte undi nee thelivi... Already jail lo unte inka nuvvu case pettedhenti?!
Andaru nannanne vaalle... Aa pilla kuda arusthundi ga... thanani anochuga? CUT TO:
9898 A song behind bars abusing each other CUT TO:
9999 VEERAYYA puts and end to the trio's shenanigans and yells at GOVARDHAN.
Norumusukuni kurcho... naaggani temper lesindhante Inspector gaaru ochcemundhe interrogation chestha! GOVARDHAN is scandalized and afraid. He turns away and his eyes meet VEDA’s eyes.
Avasarama aayanni kelakatam... ippudu kashtaalemanna thakkuvunnaaya? CUT TO:
100100 SUBBA RAJU and ANTHONY look at each other and smirk, which turns into a wild laughter. CUT TO:

101101 VASU and RAJU are counting and printing new currency while the Modi demonetization address airs on TV. With them is a third man - ANTHONY, who walks over to a gate on the other side of the printing press, next to the doors of an open container.
Entira enthasepudninchi print chesthunnaamu inka container nindaledha..
Laksha kotlu ante kashtapadaali mari. Idhemaina chamata udchi sampadinchindha...print guddhadam ae kadha..
Rei...meeru chamata udchalsina avasaram em ledhu... nenu chusukunta..meeru party chesukondi.. ANTHONY smirks. CUT TO:

102102 SUBBA RAJU hands VEERAYYA the 2,000 rupee note, and walks away. VEERAYYA walks with the note and quickly slides his hand against the waist of a woman on the dance floor - he puts the note in her dress’ crease and walks away. She stops dancing and slowly heads to a cordoned off region - she walks past for goons, and heads into a poorly lit space, where the FOREST MINISTER waits. She hands the FOREST MINISTER a 200 rupee note. The FOREST MINISTER takes this, and gets up His men quickly surround him, and the group quickly exits. CUT TO:
103103 VASU is driving a container out, as RAJU guides him. The container stops, as ANTHONY comes out from the other side, smiles and hand them two beers. CUT TO:

104104 The cigarette near the leaking fuel pipe is picked up by ANTHONY. RAJU comes back, while VASU gets up. ANTHONY, VASU and RAJU get body bags from the Vaikuntha Ratham and place them in the car. They pour fuel on the car and light it on fire. CUT TO:

105105 VASU and RAJU come on a Royal Enfield, slowly, beat up. VASU gets off and open the giant styrofoam box next to container. He picks up a beer, a chunk of ice and puts it on his swollen face. He tosses a beer towards RAJU, who drops it. VASU soon bottoms-up his beer. CUT TO:
106106 SUBBA RAJU, ANTHONY and VEERAYYA get off from the jeep and start walking, ANTHONY in the front, seemingly leading them somewhere.
Jaffa gaallu ninnu ela nammaaru raa

Jaffa na duffidheelu..ee madhya youth bheja lekunda pudthunnaaru SUBBA RAJU subtely reduces his pace and gets completely behind ANTHONY. He points his gun at the back of ANTHONY's head when a gunshot goes off - SUBBA RAJU and VEERAYYA are being shot at by VASU and RAJU. ANTHONY runs away, while SUBBA RAJU and VEERAYYA dodge fire. Both the parties hide behind two opposite walls and look through some openings in the wall. VEERAYYA's arm is grazed.
Vaalla deggara rendu guns... SUBBA RAJU looks at his gun and VEERAYYA's big useless gun. VEERAYYA looks helpless.
(opening the gun) Four bullets! SUBBA RAJU can hear them loading their guns.

Kachithanga champesthaaru. VEERAYYA looks resigned. SUBBA RAJU calms himself, as VASU and RAJU come closer. He removes his shoes and starts climbing the tiled roofs stealthily. He reaches behind VASU and RAJU, takes aim and kills VASU with a headshot. At this moment, VEERAYYA charges RAJU and takes him down. SUBBA RAJU walks up to him and finishes him off with a kill shot. SUBBA RAJU and VEERAYYA head over to the container nearby.

Already police records prakaaram chanipoyaaru kada... They reach the container - it is already open. SUBBA RAJU suspiciously opens the container and checks a bundle of notes; his expression changes. CUT TO:
107107 ANTHONY enters the locked printing press alone, and locks up. He dumps stacks of bundles into the rear of a container loaded onto a truck. CUT TO:

108108 ANTHONY picks up a beer bottle lying next to a passed out VASU. RAJU is also lying passed out, in a dried up pool of his vomit. He has a sip and chucks it into the quarry. He drives away on the container truck. Then he comes in on an identical container truck, before he swaps their number plates. CUT TO:
109109 VASU and RAJU reach the container. They begin to open it.
Macha aakasham anchula varaku velipovachu ee dabbulu tho
Manam inka evadi kaallu naakavasaram ledhu VASU opens the container and jumps on the money stack in glee. RAJU comes and starts packing a bag
Rei, ivi manam print chesina note- lu!!!
110110 SUBBA RAJU looks bamboozled as the realization dawns on him. VEERAYYA looks to him, contemplating.
Amma na ANTHONY ga sariga dinchav ra. evvi kuda vellu print chesinive. He pulls out his phone and calls ANTHONY. CUT TO:
111111 ANTHONY sees the call and pulls out the battery, throws away the sim and the phone, laughing wildly. CUT TO:
112112 ANTHONY's point of view song. CUT TO:

113113 SUBBA RAJU and VEERAYYA are burying VASU and RAJU. BHANU, who is drinking at the graveyard, sees this from a distance. He slowly slips out of the graveyard’s back exit among the woods and calls VEDA. CUT TO:
114114 VEDA is on the phone, talking to BHANU. He ends the call, looking quite disturbed. He drags SULOCHANA to one end of the cell and talks to her very quietly.
Adhey manalni kotti jail lo pettinchaadu chudu ANTHONY...vaalla friends ni.
Bha purthiga vinu.. VEDA narrates the events of the graveyard, leaving SULOCHANA blank.
Aa police inspector ae champaadanta. Ippude BHANU phone chesi cheppadu...vadu akkade unadu anta appudu.
Telidu, ANTHONY maathram ledu anta. Vaadini kuda champesuntaadu.

Asalem jaruguthundi???... Podduna vaalliddharu chanipoyaaru anukuni... Baba kanapadakunda poyi... ippudu vaallani champi saksham cheppinodu chanipoyi...aemo VEDA... bhayamgaa undi...manalni em chesthaaro...

GOVARDHAN ki em cheppaku... bhayapadi gola chesthaadu. GOVARDHAN, in the other corner of the cell, however has heard it. He sighs. SULOCHANA's phone buzzes. She answers the call. VOICE (O.S.) Life insurance kaavaala madam? Kevalam eroju ke oka bumper pamper plan undhi!!
Pamper plan ah?? Ee pamper plan lo emi emi pamperinglu unnaayi
asalu emi jaruguthondho nee chedha pattina burraki ardham avuthundha?
Ah ammayini ani emi labam. Antha nee valle...
Indhaka aa Anthony gadu adhe ani ippudu nuvvu adhe ante ela...Naaku claustrophobia undhi telusa? CUT TO:
115115 The sparsely filled stationed is manned by VEERAYYA, who is on the phone, and a couple of constables. VEDA, GOVARDHAN and SULOCHANA are stuck in the cell, desperate and helpless.

Mari station lo unna aa pillalu? SUBBA RAJU (O.S.) Chuddam...Aedokati cheddam... VEDA is holding on to the bars of the cell, screaming. GOVARDHAN stands next to him. SULOCHANA sits in the corner of the cell.
Vaddhu! Champoddhu!... Meme champamaamu ani cheppamante chepthaamu...Jailo anna brathikundocchu...
Maakem theleedu... mammalni encounter cheyyoddu... SULOCHANA starts sobbing. VEERAYYA stands next to the cell bars, points his phone to the cell, and talks to the trio.
Meeremanna naxalites aa cheyataaniki...ikkada meeru undatam safe kadaani jail maarusthunnam...
Ledu!...Mammalni vadilinatte vadili venakanundi shoot chesthaaru... Naaku thelusu...
Idigo naaku mimmalni bathilaade time ledu... vasthaara naalugu peeki theesukellamantaara?
VEDA aayana maata vinaku... bayapadaku...dhebbalu padthe paddai, nuvvu maatram aa rodlu odhalaku. SUBBA RAJU is listening to it from the phone. VEERAYYA puts the phone back in his ear.
Appatinundi idhe gola saar... SUBBA RAJU (O.S.)

(sighs) Sarle...poddhunnundi bhayam tho chasthunnattunaaru... nenu vachi maatlaadutha... cell lo unna migitha iddarini vadileyyi. He hangs up the call. VEDA and GOVARDHAN are still clinging and staring in horror as VEERAYYA opens the cell. He asks the other two inmates, one of whom is the BUM, to get up and leave. Seeing this, VEDA and GOVARDHAN start wailing even harder. A constable, the only other person in the station, is at the entrance, not bothered about what happens inside. The BUM picks up the briefcase and leaves.
Vaallanenduku pampichesaaru??? Saakshaalavvuthaarana... Lockup lo ne champesetattunnaaru!
Sir... champoddu sir... memu paaripomu sir... maakem theleedu sir... kaavaalante anni oppesukuni edella siksha veyandi saar... champoddu sir. SULOCHANA starts weeping.
Bha! Chepthe vine paristhithi lo leru... yedavani koncham sepu. He calls the constable from outside and gives him some money
Biryani theesukura...nuvvu thinesi maaku theesukura... late aina parvaledu.

dialogues: Ayyooo!! Constable ni kuda pampichesaadu... Ayyo!

content.text: (Pointing at SULOCHANA) Paapam ammayi saar... please saar. VEERAYYA has had enough by now.
Noru musukuntaara koncham sepu!.. Yem cheyyananni chepthunnaanu ga! Nannu chusthe encounter chestha anipisthunada??
Mimmalni chusthe anipiyyatledu saar... Saar ni chusthe anipisthundi saar... Please saar... mammalnodileyandi saar... Champoddu saar.
Bha! Cheppina ardham kaadayya meeku... yedupugottu yedavalu.
Poni kaneesam noppi lekunda anna champandi saar...
Budhunda? Champoddhani nenu bathilaaduthunte noppi lekunda champamantaav... adi tharavaatha aadaalsina beram, ippude modalupettaku nuvvu. VEDA turns towards VEERAYYA.
Saar!...aayana maatalu vinakandi saar!!! Champoddu saar. SUBBA RAJU walks in to the station, slightly amused.
Meeru vellochu... VEERAYYA has a faint smile on his face. The three walk out with trepidation. They turn back and see SUBBA RAJU, still in shock. SUBBA RAJU turns and talks towards VEERAYYA.
Case close cheyyali... paper work chaala untadi...
SUBBA RAJU (CONT’D) Thellarangaane Prasad ni pilipinchi paperwork finish cheyinchandi.

SHAM GOPAL VERMA garu ramanaru. Nenu bayaluderutha. SUBBA RAJU leaves. The trio stand in the middle of the station, too afraid to move. VEERAYYA picks up some papers and files from SUBBA RAJU's table and puts them in a shelf. The three feel a little weird at how very little attention is now being paid to them. VEDA slowly turns his foot towards the door and tries to put one step forward. He looks at VEERAYYA to see if he would notice. VEERAYYA is not bothered, busy with his work. Slowly, VEDA takes another step forward. SULOCHANA and GOVARDHAN follow him cautiously. GOVARDHAN then starts to go back, towards his tiffin box and water flask. VEDA is peeved at him.

Naa tiffin box! VEDA bites his teeth to control his anger. SULOCHANA puts her hand on his shoulder and calms him down. GOVARDHAN tip-toes to his stuff and picks them up. Just as he turns back, VEERAYYA turns to look at them... The three freeze in their tracks. VEERAYYA is just staring at them.

...Enti? The three don't say anything. VEERAYYA turns away, muttering to himself. The three walk to the exit, very, very, very slowly constantly looking over their back. They almost exit, when VEERAYYA comes and aims a gun at them. The three freeze in their tracks, choked with fear and huddled close to each other with tightly shut eyes. VEERAYYA's looks serious... A tense three seconds pass... then VEERAYYA chuckles and gets back to his paperwork. CUT TO:
116116 VEDA, GOVARDHAN and SULOCHANA are standing dumbfounded. SUBBA RAJU (CONT’D) Trailing them, a few feet behind, is the BUM. GOVARDHAN cleans his hands with hand-sanitizer.

Asalemavuthundhi... Aemayyindi asalu eeroju... etla accident irukkunnaam, etla murder lo irukkunnaam, etla dongathanam lo irukkunnaam... etla antha easy ga clear aipoyi intikellipomannaaru...Asalu manakantu ae freedom leda... evado irikkichaadu, evado thannaadu, evado vellipomantunnadu... asalemavuthundi...
Emo!... Vadilesaaru... adhe chaalu naaku... Evvariki em cheppakunda gammuna calm ga life edo chinna urlo gadipestha nenu inka...
Maa Amma cheppinodini pelli chesukuni nenu US vellipotha...
intiki velagane Aa ANJI gaadu paegulu theesi medalo vesukunta.... The two look at him, surprised that he hasn’t changed despite the eventful day.
Repu aa aada boss na brain lo spoon esukuni thintadhi eeroju raaledani... GOVARDHAN continues muttering to himself under his breath lost in his thoughts. The other two shake their heads.

Aa police yedavalu kukkalni thippuntaaru naa illantha.... Enni literla dettol paduthado... GOVARDHAN starts calculating. They are walking on a dimly lit, deserted road. SULOCHANA hears a rush of footsteps. She looks at VEDA, who also hears it. GOVARDHAN is still muttering under his breath. SULOCHANA moves closer to VEDA. He turns back and sees some large, shadowy figures walking towards him. No one else on the road. VEDA suddenly picks up the pace and starts running. He pulls SULOCHANA along with him. Both of them sprint. GOVARDHAN is shocked for a second. He turns and sees the men behind him. Afraid, he also turns and runs behind VEDA and SULOCHANA. The BUM sees the trio and also runs, seemingly for no reason.
(Yelling) Cheppakunda pargedthaava... Drohiiiiiiiiii!!! The men chasing, the Minister’s goons, also start running. CUT TO:

117117 Festivities are galore, with the house lit up, and a welcome board saying it is the FOREST Minister's GRANDSON's birthday. VEDA, SULOCHANA, GOVARDHAN and the BUM have their heads covered with black cloth. The LEAD GOON, sitting in the van, calls the FOREST MINISTER.
Anna nalugurini thesukocham pacha briefcase okati undhi FOREST MINISTER (O.S.) Rey rey pacha briefcase kadu errupu briefcase, evarini thesukuvocharu... Naluguru evvaru ra, muggure kadhaa
Kani naluguru unnaaru anna FOREST MINISTER (O.S.) Rey dhedhdheemag chepinna pani eppudaina sarigga chesaaru ra?
Anna ila tidhethe velpotha FOREST MINISTER (O.S.) Sare agorinchavule..baba gaadini kattesina room ki tesukuni randi.
Sare anna. The LEAD GOON pulls out a piece of paper.
Attendance thesukunta paru pilichi napudu present ani cheya ethandi He digs into his pocket, and slowly puts on spectacles, with one side of the frame broken.
Present enti ra present enti?? Present sir anali
Alphabetical order adhikaadhu VEDA and SULOCHANA sigh
ABC Vocha? The LEAD GOON nods
A b c d e f g The LEAD GOON realizes he is being bullied
edhi emmana school aa ra abcd lu chepadaaniki
Mari edhi emmana school aa attendance tesukovadaniki? The LEAD GOON hits GOVARDHAN with a stick

Anna correct gaane cheppaaru list lo mugguru ae unnaaru..nuvvu evaru ra? The LEAD GOON pulls off the black cloth from the BUM's head. The BUM stares at him. The LEAD GOON shoos away the reluctant BUM, who looks into the vehicle to take back his briefcase. The LEAD GOON sees the BUM looking for his briefcase.
Anna erra briefcase annaaru kadhaa edhi pacha briefcase..manaki avasaram ledhu. Sare thesuko raa..
Anna adhi The SUB-ASSISTANT GOON tugs at the ASSISTANT GOON.
Rey musuko anna ki varnandhatvam undhi
Adhe colour blindness...erupu kanapadadhu. The BUM walks away with the briefcase, losing himself in the crowd. CUT TO:
118118 The trio are unmasked - they see that they're in a dark, dingy place, with the FOREST MINISTER and his men. Also in the room is CHINTHAN BABA.
nichuda, nikrushtuda, dharidhruda, chandaaluda, em dhroham chesaanra neeku bathikundi nee murder kesulo mammallni irikinchav kadhara...ninnu... GOVARDHAN charges towards CHINTHAN BABA
Aaganu, chachhina aaganu, veedni champedhaaka aaganu GOVARDHAN starts hitting CHINTHAN BABA
Anandham.... thappu... Anadham GOVARDHAN pulls out a kerchief
GOVARDHAN vadhu. vadhu... GOVARDHAN places the hand kerchief and bites CHINTHAN BABA, who cries in pain. CUT TO:
INT. MINISTER'S HOUSE-CCTV CONTROL ROOM - NIGHT
119119 The FOREST MINISTER looks at VEDA, SULOCHANA and GOVARDHAN from a CCTV, along with the CULTURAL MINISTER and the

dialogues: Poddunna veella deggara emanna brief case undindaa ra?

content.text: Ledanna... He is interrupted by the LEAD GOON
Ikadda senior matladutuntey silent ga undali ani telidhaa ASSISTANT GOON shuts up.
Container ani adagalsindhe briefcase antunav enti? Mind emanna dobbindha?
Ninu nammi motham udchi icham, commission kuda thesukunaavu.
Memu calm ga ne untaam, home minister ki telisindhi antey neeku thata thesthadu.
Meeru chepthara? The other two go silent. CUT TO:
120120 The FOREST MINISTER's goons have GOVARDHAN, SULOCHANA and VEDA tied up. The goons clear out a path, as the FOREST MINISTER enters the room.
Ee muggure.... anna ee muggure.... veelle thisukellaaru
Ekkadundhi Briefcase? No one responds. The FOREST MINISTER slowly starts walking towards a door.

Nenu modhalupettinappudu ee sevaalanni ela odhilinchukovaalo ardham ayyedhi kaadhu..paatha samaadhuluni tavvi daantlo paathesevaadini kaani aedho oka porapaatu jarigedhi...okasaari maa vaadu oka English cinema loo chusaadu...sevaalanni pandhula toh etla odhilinchukuntaaro...Pandhulu manishula bokkale navalesthaayi...aina manushula sevalu chaala bhaari gaa untaayi. He knocks on a door, a secret code knock - twice, a pause, once, a pause, a third time..
Nijamga perfect gaa cheyaalante aa sevam ni aaru mukkalu gaa narakaali....daani kosam em kaavalo thelusaa... The door opens

Kasaayi sainyam... Inside the door is a small room, all walls covered in plastic, four big men wearing leather aprons, bloody cleavers in hand. One standing next to the door, Two cleaning up their blades, and the fourth stuffing something into a gunny bag - one among four lying on the floor.
Aipoinda.. The BUTCHER at the door doesn’t answer
Meeru tappu password kottaaru...nenu mee tho maatlaadakudadhu..
Naaku ela telusthundhi edhi meere ani? Aa? Asalu ela? Idhi matrix cinema laantidhi aithe?
Ledhu...meeru meere naa kaadha ani doubt gaa undhi
Nijamga sir, maakem thelidhu. Aame SULOCHANA, journalist. Ithanu
Nenu VEDA, software engineer.. Anthe sir, maaku dheeniki sambhandham ledhu.
Nenu idhi varaku software engineer, cognizant lo...
mast hot undedhi dude...nannu reject chesindhi college lo ...bitch
Aapandi ee circus. Andharu! Mee mugguru, mee daggara 45 minutes unnaayi...cheptaara lendante kasai sainyaani daggara pampamantaara?
Ee roju ki pani aipoindhi..ippudu velthe traffic nee tappinchukovachu
Ardharaathiri varaku pani cheyi...ee vedhavala pani chusi po
Nuvvu nijamgaane forest minister vi The LEAD GOON enters
Sare...pada The FOREST MINISTER exits the room. CUT TO:
121121 The CULTURAL MINISTER and TRANSPORT MINISTER are waiting. As soon as the door opens, the anxiously jump to question the FOREST MINISTER.
Ledhu The FOREST MINISTER walks off.
Mana daggara edho daasthunnaadu. Container ani adakkunda briefcase antunnaadu...vaallu cheppey unduntaru...veedu dasthunnaadu.
Mari em chedam The CULTURAL MINISTER thinks for a while and pulls the monkey cap he was wearing till his nose.
122122 The CULTURAL MINISTER enters the room, his face covered with the monkey cap. He walks straight up to the trio.
Annallaara, cheylillaara, endhaka ayanaki emi cheparu...
Nijamga sir, maakem theliyadhu. Nenu VEDA, software engineer. Aame SULOCHANA journalist. Ithanu
Indhaka ayana adhe kada adigaaru. Teledhu annam kada. Vexed, the CULTURAL MINISTER walks out CUT TO:
123123 The CULTURAL MINISTER shuts the door in frustration and throws down the monkey cap.
Vaalaki teledhu anta The CULTURAL MINISTER walks off. The TRANSPORT MINISTER now doubts if he is being left out by the other two. He pulls on the monkey cap. CUT TO:

124124 In the dingy room, the TRANSPORT MINISTER is now questioning the three
nijamga sir, maakem theliyadhu. nenu VEDA, software engineer. Aame SULOCHANA journalist. Ithanu
GOVARDHAN, bank employee nee ah briefcase ento container ento maaku telidhu. Enni sarlu adugutharu... CUT TO:

Andaru abbadaalu aduthunnaaru. Nenu adugutha. CUT TO:

Nuvvu evadivi raa? Different different size lo vochi adigina maaku telidhu.
GOVARHDAN nuvvu aagu.. Addressing the GRANDSON
Dabbu telidha? Ma thatha and vere minister uncles unnaaru kadh
Ma thatha evadu antaava? The infuriated child removes his monkey cap
Drama uncle theylidha? Drama uncle vaalley eroju na birthday ki ekkada ekadinincho dancers ni mari drama volu ni pilichaaru.
Asalu em matladuthunnaavura pilla rakshasi The GRANDSON starts crying. VEDA chides GOVARDHAN.
Nuvvu konchem seypu norumusukuni vuntaava? The GRANDSON starts laughing at GOVARDHAN after VEDA chides him.
